cast.character: Abis Mal - the Chief of the Thieves (voice)
cast.name: Jason Alexander

title: The Return of Jafar
summary: The sultan is grooming Aladdin as new vizier, future son in law and heir to the throne of Agraba, stirring palatial unrest. Former vizier-usurper Jafar was banished to a genie lamp, but is dug up by ambitious simpleton crook Abis Mal, whom he manages to manipulate his three wishes so eh can regain his power and return to Agraba for major revenge. His egotistic formerly trusted parrot Iago has already managed to cash on the palace's gratitude, but is facing conflicting loyalties when his former master reveals himself to him. Genie is finally back and must take on a magic duel against Jafar, whose dirty tricks land Aladdin and Jasmine in the dungeons.
